properties.title: Sushi Dai
images: Located in the Tsujiki Fish Market, ~1.5 hour wait (lucky for this place!). Only open for breakfast - lunch. ¥4000/person for 10 pieces of nigiri, rolls, egg, and miso-soup. Highly recommended!

properties.title: Ichiran (Shinbashi)
images: Chain restaurant with individual cubbies to consume your ramen in. Definitely worth the experience, but not the best ramen in Tokyo.

properties.title: Caretta Shiodome
images: Light display (seasonal?), with light show ~15 minutes. The theme at the time was Beauty and the Beast. Outside of a shopping mall.

properties.title: Meguro River
images: In cherry blossom season, this river area is covered with cherry blossoms. This photo was taken in winter, so no cherry blossoms were present :(

properties.title: Nissan Crossing
images:
Photo printed latte art for ¥500.
On the top of the Nissan Crossing building, with Nissan cars on display throughout the building.

Chicken wings

images: About 20 minutes to get to the top. All uphill stairs.

properties.title: Passeggiata del Pincio
images: Great view, if you keep walking after you see the Spanish Steps

properties.title: Piazza Di Spagna
images: The piazza connecting to the Spanish Steps. If you"re jetlagged while in Rome - take advantage! This is the piazza ~ 6 am. Barely anyone but birds.

properties.title: Spanish Steps
images: From the top of the steps, in the middle of the day in August

properties.title: Punto Gelato (near Piazza di S. Eustachio)

images: One of the unique things about this church is the optical illusions - this is a painting, not an actual dome

properties.title: Altar of the Fatherland
images: There is a view if you walk up the stairs - but make sure you go when it is open...

properties.title: St Peter's Basilica
images: Go as early in the morning as possible. No line + less crowded = better visiting experience.

properties.title: Piazza Navona
images: A beautiful square, but many people, always

images: Larger than it appears in pictures

images: Church near the Pantheon with a beautiful ceiling

properties.title: Fatamorgana (Trastevere)
images: Fior di latte (a must try flavor) and passionfruit

properties.title: Daphne Rome B&B
images: Breakfast. A great B&B that is just a 5 minute walk from the Trevi Fountain

properties.title: La Casa Del Caffè Tazza D'oro
images: Coffee granita - heaven in a cup. The best thing I ate while in Rome (even better than gelato!!!). Right near the Pantheon
